item.description:
August TGIF Kayak Group
5 Fridays: August 2 - 31
6 - 7:30 p.m.
Blue Moon Paddle on Aug. 31!

No better way to spend August Friday early eves in Marblehead than on the water! Join Marblehead Native, veteran paddler and well-known trainer Peter Easterlind for basic kayak skills and safety combined with a rejuvenating and joyful Marblehead coastline paddle.

Instructor: Peter Easterlind and LHBs awesome Staffers
Kayaks, paddles, pfds and lights for Blue Moon Paddle included.
Register at Little Harbor Boathouse or on-line today!

Non-members: $175* 
Members: $25.
Adult paddlers only; limited enrollment - register today!

To register call: 781-990-3552 
Sign-up on-line today to secure your seat!

Make checks payable to: Rowing For All LLC 
Little Harbor Boathouse, 40 Doaks Lane, Marblehead, MA 01945

For more information visit us on-line at: http://www.rowingforall.com/little-harbor-boathouse/paddling-programs/
item.how_to_find_us: 40 Doaks Lane, Marblehead, MA. For map visit: http://www.rowingforall.com/contact/little-harbor-boathouse/

group.name: Community Rowing & Paddling on Boston's North Shore Meetup

item.name: August TGIF Kayak Group
